verbs.description: [ARG1: Music fans] [V: are] [ARG2: fickle] : if we really enjoy an artist ’s music , we tend to be more forgiving when they say or do trash things ( see : R. Kelly ’s undying career ) . That ’s why , fresh off of a string of detestable behavior — including vocal support for Donald Trump , MAGA - infused Twitter diatribes and one terrible , horrible , no - good , very bad interview …
